info.name: Anabel Hospitality IOT Alert System Rest API  Part 1

request.description: - for siteGroupName, only SA,AM,CSA,GA can update, GA can only update self siteGroupName

response.name: NOT AUTHORIZED - if the request didn't bear authentication information or the authentication information is invalid.
BAD REQUEST - if there was problem with the request (e.g. malformed or some parameters are missing).
INTERNAL SERVER ERROR - if the request was properly formatted, but the operation failed on the server side

request.description: - for siteGroupName, only SA,AM,CSA,GA can update, GA can only update self siteGroupName

response.name: NOT AUTHORIZED - if the request didn't bear authentication information or the authentication information is invalid.
BAD REQUEST - if there was problem with the request (e.g. malformed or some parameters are missing).
INTERNAL SERVER ERROR - if the request was properly formatted, but the operation failed on the server side

request.description: - the numberOfUsers in site/client need update

response.name: INTERNAL SERVER ERROR - if the request was properly formatted, but the operation failed on the server side
NOT AUTHORIZED - if the request didn't bear authentication information or the authentication information is invalid.
NOT FOUND - if the resource in request did not exist
OK delete use, SA,AM,CSA,GA,SM contact user
BAD REQUEST delete use, SA,AM,CSA,GA,SM cannot delete own account
NOT AUTHORIZED - if the request didn't bear authentication information or the authentication information is invalid.
INTERNAL SERVER ERROR - if the request was properly formatted, but the operation failed on the server side
NOT FOUND - if the resource in request did not exist

request.description:
- when user created, an email send to user (include link that used to Confirmation) 
- siteId is required for GA,SM
- permissions need generate by (adminUserType,groupAdminSites) / siteUserType
- client/site numberOfUsers need recalculate

response.name: Forbidden (403), AM Trying to add different client
INTERNAL SERVER ERROR - if the request was properly formatted, but the operation failed on the server side
BAD REQUEST - if there was problem with the request (e.g. malformed or some parameters are missing).
400 admin user limit reached

query.description: The number of items to list per page.
search by username and email, should be fuzzing match and ignore case
